author: anmenaga
body:
Importing a single module from a remote session adds all formats from that remote session.
[`Import-Module -Name -PSSession` is calling `Export-PSSession -FormatTypeName *`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/Modules/ImportModuleCommand.cs#L1004).
Instead of all formats from remote session, this should import only formats used by the module.
Please note that the remote session can be PS Core as well as Windows PS.

A partial fix (suggested by @daxian-dbw) can be done for the local loopback case: instead of `-FormatTypeName *` specify actual formats used by the module by analyzing module's manifest (path to which is known because it is local) (`class TypesPs1xmlReader` may be useful for this)

# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
# create a remoting session to Windows PS
$s = New-PSSession -ConfigurationName microsoft.powershell
Import-Module -Name PSScheduledJob -PSSession $s
# check to see an updated format for the type that has nothing to do with the imported module
$formatData = Get-FormatData -TypeName "System.Diagnostics.Process" -PowerShellVersion $PSVersionTable.PSVersion
$tableControls = $formatData.FormatViewDefinition | Where-Object {$_.Control -is "System.Management.Automation.TableControl"}
# there should be No `Handles` column - see issue #1812 for details
$tableControls | % { $_.Control.Headers.Label -match "Handle*" | Should BeNullOrEmpty }
```

# Expected behavior

test passes

# Actual behavior

```none
InvalidResult: C:\PowerShell\Modules\Pester\4.8.0\Functions\Assertions\Should.ps1
Line |
 169 |         throw ( New-ShouldErrorRecord -Message $testResult.FailureMessage -File $file -Line $lineNumber -LineText $lineText )
     |         ^ Expected $null or empty, but got Handles.
```

# Environment data

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.0.0-preview.5
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.0.0-preview.5
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.14393
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Import-Module -Name -PSSession imports all formats from remote session
